enabled.description: When true, indicates that Page Shield is enabled.

updated_at.description: The timestamp of when Page Shield was last updated.

use_cloudflare_reporting_endpoint.description: When true, CSP reports will be sent to https://csp-reporting.cloudflare.com/cdn-cgi/script_monitor/report

use_connection_url_path.description: When true, the paths associated with connections URLs will also be analyzed.
